title: Metrozen Capital Offers Shelter From Market Volatility
text:
September 02, 2015 13:29 ET Metrozen Capital Offers Shelter From Market Volatility 
Investors Find Security and Fixed 9% Annual Return TORONTO, ON --(Marketwired - September 02, 2015) - Metrozen Capital Inc. stands apart from today's unstable investment community establishment offerings by providing investors a unique, fixed-income investment opportunity that boasts security, stability and an exceptional 9% annual return. 
With today’s shaky stock market and global economic woes even a seasoned investor is challenged and also may feel uneasy. Metrozen Capital offers a better, fully-secured alternative. Their syndicated mortgage combines funds from several investors to purchase real properties. All investments are secured by ownership of real estate properties. 
Investing in Metrozen Capital’s syndicated mortgage provides an ideal alternative to investors who are tired of lacklustre and unstable returns from other investments. FinancialPost.com’s *Loans & Savings Rate Tables on August 31 show the maximum return for a 5-year Registered Retirement Savings Plans (RRSP) is 2.5% (pale in comparison to Metrozen Capital’s fixed 9% annual return). 
Investors also benefit from the stability of Metrozen Capital’s fixed high rate of return paid monthly. With no units to own or shares that fluctuate in value, investments earn 9% per annum, paid monthly for the length of the term. A minimum term of 36 months is required, with an option to renew. 
Only Metrozen Capital offers this unique opportunity and a secured high yield 9% annual return. Investments are Cash, RRSP, TFSA, LIRA and LIF eligible so virtually every person can benefit from high-yield, rock-solid investment growth.
